turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm calling because I think there's a problem with my bill. It's much higher than usual this month!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the billing issue. I'd be happy to look into that for you. Can I get your account number, please?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Sure, it's 1234567890. And honestly, this is ridiculous. I haven't changed my usage habits at all, so I don't understand why the bill is so high.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. Please give me a moment to review your account and billing details. Hmm, I see a significant increase in data usage this month. Did you perhaps stream more videos or download any large files?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I don't think so. I did download some software updates, but I thought those were pretty small files. And even if I did use a little more data, it shouldn't account for *this* much extra on the bill! Is there any way to see a breakdown of where the extra charges are coming from?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Yes, certainly. Let me generate a detailed usage report for you. Unfortunately, I'm experiencing some technical difficulties right now, so the report generation is taking a bit longer than usual. I am seeing a charge for international calls, though. Can you confirm if you made any international calls?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: International calls? No, I haven't made any international calls! What's going on? This is incredibly frustrating, and it looks like I am going to have to contact someone in a different department to get this straightened out.
